item.title: A new form of WebXR
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Accessing native XR features from the device using a web page is another form of WebXR. In this article, I want to share an experiment where I tried to control the android deviceâ€™s native features such as controlling volume and camera torch from a web page. This use case can be really useful in the XR world, where I can control the feature access in the device from cloud services, even the whole look and feel for showing the device controls can be managed from a hosted web page.
